`,(0,e.jsx)(n.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(n.code,{children:`import pandas as pd
import json
import re
from datetime import datetime

def load_classification_rules():
    """\uBD84\uB958\uAE30\uC900.json \uD30C\uC77C\uC744 \uB85C\uB4DC\uD569\uB2C8\uB2E4."""
    with open('\uBD84\uB958\uAE30\uC900.json', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        return json.load(f)

def classify_transaction(merchant, business_type, rules):
    """\uAC70\uB798 \uB0B4\uC6A9\uC744 \uBD84\uC11D\uD558\uC5EC \uBD84\uB958\uC640 \uC18C\uBD84\uB958\uB97C \uACB0\uC815\uD569\uB2C8\uB2E4."""
    # \uAC00\uB9F9\uC810\uBA85\uACFC \uC5C5\uC885\uC744 \uACB0\uD569\uD574\uC11C \uBD84\uC11D
    description = f"{merchant} {business_type}".lower() if pd.notna(business_type) else str(merchant).lower()

    # \uD2B9\uC218\uBB38\uC790 \uC81C\uAC70\uD558\uB418 \uB354 \uAD00\uB300\uD558\uAC8C
    description_clean = re.sub(r'[^\\w\\s\uAC00-\uD7A3a-zA-Z0-9()]', ' ', description)
    description_clean = re.sub(r'\\s+', ' ', description_clean).strip()


    # \uD2B9\uBCC4 \uCC98\uB9AC - \uAC00\uC7A5 \uBA3C\uC800 \uCC98\uB9AC
    etc = ['\uCE74\uCE74\uC624\uD398\uC774']
    if any(name in description_clean for name in etc):
        return '\uAE30\uD0C0', '\uAE30\uD0C0'


    # \uBA3C\uC800 \uBD84\uB958\uAE30\uC900.json\uC758 \uD0A4\uC6CC\uB4DC\uB85C \uB9E4\uCE6D
    for category, subcategories in rules.items():
        for subcategory in subcategories:
            if subcategory.lower() in description_clean:
                return category, subcategory

def main():
    """\uBA54\uC778 \uD568\uC218"""
    print("\u{1F6D2} \uC18C\uBE44\uB0B4\uC5ED \uBD84\uB958\uAE30 v2.0 (\uAC1C\uC120\uB41C \uD0A4\uC6CC\uB4DC)")
    print("=" * 60)

    # \uBD84\uB958 \uADDC\uCE59 \uB85C\uB4DC
    try:
        rules = load_classification_rules()
        print("\u2705 \uBD84\uB958\uAE30\uC900.json \uB85C\uB4DC \uC644\uB8CC")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"\u274C \uBD84\uB958\uAE30\uC900.json \uB85C\uB4DC \uC2E4\uD328: {e}")
        return

    # \uC18C\uBE44\uB0B4\uC5ED \uD30C\uC77C \uC77D\uAE30 (xlsx \uB610\uB294 csv)
    try:
        try:
            df = pd.read_excel('\uC18C\uBE44\uB0B4\uC5ED.xlsx')
            print(f"\u2705 \uC18C\uBE44\uB0B4\uC5ED.xlsx \uD30C\uC77C \uB85C\uB4DC \uC644\uB8CC ({len(df):,}\uAC74)")
        except:
            df = pd.read_csv('\uC18C\uBE44\uB0B4\uC5ED.csv', encoding='utf-8-sig')
            print(f"\u2705 \uC18C\uBE44\uB0B4\uC5ED.csv \uD30C\uC77C \uB85C\uB4DC \uC644\uB8CC ({len(df):,}\uAC74)")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"\u274C \uC18C\uBE44\uB0B4\uC5ED \uD30C\uC77C \uB85C\uB4DC \uC2E4\uD328: {e}")
        return

    # \uB370\uC774\uD130 \uC804\uCC98\uB9AC
    print("\\n\u{1F4CA} \uB370\uC774\uD130 \uC804\uCC98\uB9AC \uC911...")

    # \uC774\uC6A9\uAE08\uC561\uC744 \uC22B\uC790\uB85C \uBCC0\uD658
    df['\uAE08\uC561'] = df['\uC774\uC6A9\uAE08\uC561'].astype(str).str.replace(',', '').str.replace('\uC6D0', '')
    df['\uAE08\uC561'] = pd.to_numeric(df['\uAE08\uC561'], errors='coerce').fillna(0)

    # \uBE48 \uAC12 \uCC98\uB9AC
    df['\uC5C5\uC885'] = df['\uC5C5\uC885'].fillna('')
    df['\uC774\uC6A9\uAC00\uB9F9\uC810'] = df['\uC774\uC6A9\uAC00\uB9F9\uC810'].fillna('')

    # \uBD84\uB958 \uC9C4\uD589
    print("\u{1F50D} \uAC70\uB798 \uBD84\uB958 \uC911...")
    categories = []
    subcategories = []

    for idx, row in df.iterrows():
        category, subcategory = classify_transaction(
            row['\uC774\uC6A9\uAC00\uB9F9\uC810'],
            row['\uC5C5\uC885'],
            rules
        )
        categories.append(category)
        subcategories.append(subcategory)

    # \uB0A0\uC9DC \uD615\uC2DD \uCC98\uB9AC
    if df['\uC774\uC6A9\uC77C\uC790'].dtype == 'object':
        df['\uC774\uC6A9\uC77C\uC790'] = pd.to_datetime(df['\uC774\uC6A9\uC77C\uC790'], format='%Y.%m.%d', errors='coerce')

    # \uACB0\uACFC DataFrame \uC0DD\uC131
    result_df = pd.DataFrame({
        '\uB0A0\uC9DC': df['\uC774\uC6A9\uC77C\uC790'].dt.strftime('%Y-%m-%d'),
        '\uC2DC\uAC04': df['\uC774\uC6A9\uC2DC\uAC04'],
        '\uC790\uC0B0': df['\uC774\uC6A9\uCE74\uB4DC'],
        '\uBD84\uB958': categories,
        '\uC18C\uBD84\uB958': subcategories,
        '\uAE08\uC561(\uC6D0)': df['\uAE08\uC561'].abs(),
        '\uD654\uD3D0\uAD6C\uBD84': 'KRW',
        '\uB0B4\uC6A9': df['\uC774\uC6A9\uAC00\uB9F9\uC810'],
        '\uBA54\uBAA8': df['\uC5C5\uC885']
    })

    # \uB0A0\uC9DC\uC21C \uC815\uB82C
    result_df = result_df.sort_values('\uB0A0\uC9DC', ascending=False)

    # CSV\uB85C \uC800\uC7A5
    output_filename = f'\uCD5C\uC885_\uBD84\uB958\uB41C_\uC18C\uBE44\uB0B4\uC5ED_{datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")}.csv'
    result_df.to_csv(output_filename, index=False, encoding='utf-8-sig')

    print(f"\\n" + "=" * 60)
    print(f"\u2705 \uBD84\uB958 \uC644\uB8CC!")
    print(f"\u{1F4CA} \uCD1D \uAC70\uB798 \uC218: {len(result_df):,}\uAC1C")
    print(f"\u{1F4B0} \uCD1D \uAE08\uC561: {result_df['\uAE08\uC561(\uC6D0)'].sum():,.0f}\uC6D0")
    print(f"\u{1F4C5} \uAE30\uAC04: {result_df['\uB0A0\uC9DC'].min()} ~ {result_df['\uB0A0\uC9DC'].max()}")
    print(f"\u{1F4BE} \uC800\uC7A5\uB41C \uD30C\uC77C: {output_filename}")

    # \uBD84\uB958\uBCC4 \uC694\uC57D
    print(f"\\n\u{1F4C8} \uBD84\uB958\uBCC4 \uC694\uC57D:")
    category_summary = result_df.groupby('\uBD84\uB958')['\uAE08\uC561(\uC6D0)'].agg(['sum', 'count'])
    category_summary = category_summary.sort_values('sum', ascending=False)

    for category, row in category_summary.iterrows():
        print(f"   {category}: {row['sum']:,.0f}\uC6D0 ({int(row['count'])}\uAC74)")

    # \uC18C\uBD84\uB958\uBCC4 \uC694\uC57D (\uC0C1\uC704 15\uAC1C)
    print(f"\\n\u{1F3F7}\uFE0F \uC18C\uBD84\uB958\uBCC4 \uC694\uC57D (\uC0C1\uC704 15\uAC1C):")
    subcategory_summary = result_df.groupby('\uC18C\uBD84\uB958')['\uAE08\uC561(\uC6D0)'].agg(['sum', 'count'])
    subcategory_summary = subcategory_summary.sort_values('sum', ascending=False).head(15)

    for subcategory, row in subcategory_summary.iterrows():
        print(f"   {subcategory}: {row['sum']:,.0f}\uC6D0 ({int(row['count'])}\uAC74)")

    # \uC790\uC0B0\uBCC4 \uC694\uC57D
    print(f"\\n\u{1F4B3} \uC790\uC0B0\uBCC4 \uC694\uC57D:")
    asset_summary = result_df.groupby('\uC790\uC0B0')['\uAE08\uC561(\uC6D0)'].agg(['sum', 'count'])
    asset_summary = asset_summary.sort_values('sum', ascending=False)

    for asset, row in asset_summary.iterrows():
        print(f"   {asset}: {row['sum']:,.0f}\uC6D0 ({int(row['count'])}\uAC74)")

    # \uAE30\uD0C0 \uBD84\uB958\uAC00 \uC5BC\uB9C8\uB098 \uB0A8\uC558\uB294\uC9C0 \uD655\uC778
    others_count = len(result_df[result_df['\uBD84\uB958'] == '\uAE30\uD0C0'])
    others_amount = result_df[result_df['\uBD84\uB958'] == '\uAE30\uD0C0']['\uAE08\uC561(\uC6D0)'].sum()
    print(f"\\n\u2753 \uAC1C\uC120 \uACB0\uACFC:")
    print(f"   '\uAE30\uD0C0' \uBD84\uB958: {others_count}\uAC74 ({others_amount:,.0f}\uC6D0)")
    print(f"   \uBD84\uB958 \uC815\uD655\uB3C4: {((len(result_df) - others_count) / len(result_df) * 100):.1f}%")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
